name: myPM SCG Definition File
summary: Learn about .SCG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: myPM SCG requires the input file to be in a Microsoft Excel format and also generates output to an Excel file. The input file is commonly created by exporting a Microsoft Project plan, but may also be created from another scheduling application.
NOTE: myPM SCG requires an installation of Microsoft Excel. SCG stands for "S Curve Generator."

description: Data file created by myPM SCG, a program used by project managers to generate "S curves;" contains SCG definitions, which specify the type of S curve to generate and an input and output file; used for creating outputs that visualize costs, labor hours, or other quantities.
